title: Seller Dashboard overflow menu dropdown white background styling

requirements.summary: Style the Seller Dashboard overflow dropdown panel to render with a white background, readable text/icons in all themes, and a subtle border/shadow while keeping menu items, routes, and logout behavior unchanged (using shadcn-ui DropdownMenu via class overrides).
acceptanceCriteria: In /seller-dashboard, opening the three-dot overflow menu shows a dropdown panel with a white background (not transparent/dark).
Menu item labels and icons remain readable against the white background in both light and dark app themes.
Dropdown panel has a subtle border and/or shadow consistent with the app design system and remains aligned to the trigger (no positioning regressions).

Existing menu items and behaviors remain unchanged: Store Settings navigates to /create-store, View Store navigates to /store/$supplierId, and Logout triggers the existing Internet Identity logout + query cache clear + cart clear + navigates to /.

file_operations.description: Update the shadcn-ui DropdownMenuContent and item styling via className composition (do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui) to force a white dropdown background in both themes, apply a subtle border/shadow, and set text/icon/hover/focus colors for contrast while preserving existing menu items, navigation routes, and logout logic. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
